author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter LED niche installation tips…I added the stainless steel connection box inside the niche. This allows the special LIPROTEC cable to click into the box and make a watertight seal. The LED light plugs into the cable and is dimmable at the switch. My full step-by-step video showing how to frame, add electrical, and waterproof the niche is at homerepairtutor.com 🔥Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial and providing materials for my client’s shower #showerniche #schlutersystems #showerremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter LED Niche Installation Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
